protective_factors: Strong deterrent provided by family/children ('I couldn't do that to them')
Absence of preparatory acts or plan
No history of past attempts (confirmed via Triage)
Willingness to comply with treatment changes (medication increase, behavioral goals)
risk_factors: Severe anhedonia and functional impairment (missed work)
Presence of severe vegetative symptoms (Insomnia - early morning awakening, weight loss)
Diagnosis: *Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder*, current episode Moderate (F33.1)
clinical_actions: Increase frequency of safety checks/triage (e.g., PHQ-9 + C-SSRS at next session)
Implement psychoeducation regarding passive vs. active ideation and safety resources
